text: Lasse Juhani Näsi (12 October 1930 – 22 February 2022) was a Finnish politician. He was a member of the Centre Party. He was in the Parliament of Finland from 1991 to 1995. He was also Mayor of Sodankylä from 1968 until 1993. He was born in Karunki, Finland. Näsi died on 22 February 2022, at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Finnish politicians
title: Lasse Näsi
